filters

Class IdentityFilter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • filters.Filter<T>
      • filters.IdentityFilter<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - 

    public class IdentityFilter<T>
extends Filter<T>
    IdentityFilter
    Author:
    Adam Gleichsner The IdentityFilter simply sets the output to the input. Because of how lenient it is with regards to type, we define it directly as a filter outside of the scalar family.

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      IdentityFilter()
      Constructor to initialize the filter

      void addInput(T input)
      Inputs the new value and triggers the calculation of the output
      void reset(T reset)
      Resets the filter to a given value, erasing all previous and unnecessary data
